thread.title: 17 "Bridesmaids" Moments Sum Up Life
thread.title_full: 17 "Bridesmaids" Moments That Sum Up Life In Australia

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: 17 "Bridesmaids" Moments Sum Up Life
text:
View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308639 2. And when doing mainies becomes a regular thing because you’re still underage. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308654 3. When you finally turn 18. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308626 4. When there’s a two for $20 sale on goon. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522532 5. When you’re hungover af, and finally go on a Macca’s run. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9529609 6. When your uni lecturer says that attendance is not compulsory. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522561 7. When you finally find a parking spot at Woolies, only to have someone slide right in out of nowhere. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522560 8. When “What About Me?” by Shannon Noll comes blaring out at a party. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308469 9. When you realise you’ll never be able to afford a house. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522435 10. When you watch an Aussie awards ceremony and have no fucking idea who’s even on your screen. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522538 11. When you’re at the pub for arvo drinks and two people near you are arguing about politics. Universal Pictures
Universal Pictures
 ID: 10308467 12. When you’re invited to your high school reunion. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308645 13. When it’s 35 degrees at 8am and you have to drag your sorry arse to work. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522568 14. And when the temperature keeps steadily climbing and you’re wondering if your face is about to melt off. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522580 15. When you remember how much HECs you still need to pay. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 10308637 16. When you finally meet a decent dude on Tinder. View this image ›
Universal Pictures ID: 9522535 17. And, well you know, when you drop the C-bomb at least once a day. View this image ›
Universal Pictures It’s just part of our vocab tbh.
ID: 9522595
Tahlia Pritchard is a senior writer
